text: The Night Angel Trilogy is a series of fantasy novels written by Brent Weeks. The first book in the series, The Way of Shadows, was published in October 2008, and the third book, Beyond the Shadows, was published in December 2008. ==Books== * The Way of Shadows * Shadow's Edge * Beyond the Shadows ==References== Category:American fantasy books Category:Series of books Category:2008 books
title: The Night Angel Trilogy
